links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part Two
The History of Eriol or Ælfwine and the End of the Tales

wikitext.*:
The '''Guiðlin''' were a group of people that invaded [[Tol Eressëa]] during the [[Faring Forth]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.

Later, they were conquered by [[Hengest]] and [[Horsa]], the sons of [[Eriol]].<ref>{{LT2|VI}}, outline '''14''', p. 294</ref>

According to [[John Garth]], they were likely identified with the [[wikipedia:Gaels|Gaels]].<ref>[[John Garth]], ''[[The Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'', "The Land of Lúthien", p. 51</ref>
